DOC.detailed_description: Patients present non-keratinizing NPC stage Ⅲ-Ⅳb T3-4N1M0/TxN2M0 randomly assign receive one cycle induction chemotherapy ( docetaxel+cisplatin+fluorouracil ) plus concurrent chemoradiotherapy ( investigational arm ) three cycle induction chemotherapy ( docetaxel+cisplatin+fluorouracil ) plus concurrent chemoradiotherapy ( investigational arm ) ( control arm ) . Patients arm receive radical Intensity modulate radiation therapy ( Trilogy , Varian ) , cisplatin ( 30mg/m2 ) every week six cycle radiotherapy . Radiation deliver GTV 70 Gy 30 fraction , CTV1 60 Gy 30 fraction CTV2 54 Gy 30 fraction . Patients investigational arm receive docetaxel ( 60mg/m2 day 1 ) , cisplatin ( 20mg/m2 day 1-4 ) fluorouracil ( 800mg/m2/d , continuous infusion , day 1-4 ) every three week one cycle three cycle radiotherapy . The primary end point response rate radiotherapy , failure-free survival ( FFS ) toxic effect treatment compliance . Secondary end point include overall survival ( OS ) , distant failure-free survival ( D-FFS ) , locoregional failure-free survival ( LR-FFS ) . All efficacy analysis conduct intention-to-treat population ; safety population include patient receive randomly assign treatment .
